Absol (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0358: Chimecho
Pokémon
#0360: Wynaut →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Absol (TCG Pocket).

Absol has been featured on 26 different cards since it debuted in the EX Dragon expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Absol cards are normally Darkness-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Absol

Absol
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
